title: Annual report
context: [ยง211D-9] Annual report. A participating financial institution shall submit an annual report to the department. The report shall: (1) Provide information regarding outstanding capital access loans, capital access loan losses, and any other information on capital access loans the department considers appropriate; (2) State the total amount of loans for which the department has made a contribution from the fund under this chapter; (3) Include a copy of the institution&rsquo;s most recent financial statement; and (4) Include information regarding the type and size of businesses and nonprofit organizations with capital access loans. [L 2000, c 290, pt of ยง2]
